1204-wait-crusaders-constantinople-musli.text: Wait until you hear this: In 1204, Crusaders sacked Constantinople, not just fighting Muslims, but their fellow Christians! This betrayal weakened the Byzantine Empire, paving the way for the Ottoman rise.

1250-wait-king-mali-mansa-musa-egypt-his.text: Wait until you hear this: In 1250, the King of Mali, Mansa Musa, was so wealthy that he literally caused inflation in Egypt! His pilgrimage to Mecca flooded the market with gold, making it less valuable.

1518-you-europe-strasbourg-believe-this-.text: You won't believe this: In medieval Europe, people believed that "dancing plague" could strike communities! In 1518, hundreds of folks spontaneously danced in Strasbourg, leading to exhaustion and even death.
